TALLEY.raw_line: No one's going anywhere, L-T. We can talk this guy down.Hey, George? George, don't kill the dog, okay? We don't want to hear a gun go off in there.Where's the guy's wife?Goddamnit, you said we had her. I told him we had her!Pull the dog's name out of your ass. Get the dog's name.I didn't lie to you, George. You scared your wife pretty good last night. We're having a hard time finding her.You and I have been talking for, what, sixteen hours? Keep talking. Is that your dog, too?I know you're hurting. You lose your job, you find out your wife's fucking another guy . . . but don't give up. We'll have her talk to you.George? Come back to the window.George? Leave the dog alone and come to the window.What's the dog's name?Murray!! They're in the house! His wife's in the house!It's really hard, Jane. This isn't the way I want it.I need to work out some stuff.I still see that boy's eyes.Is Amanda there?Can we talk some more when you get here?What are you talking about, shot? What happened?Where are they?Sonofabitch.Are civilians inside?Holster your guns!Mike! Mike, can you hear me?Don't shout, Larry. I'm three feet away.We have to cordon off the streets, then evacuate these houses.Keep your head down.How you doing, buddy? You still alive?Jesus. You hang on.He's in the backseat!This is Talley. Who's on?One at a time! Clear the air! Louise? Talk to me. What do we have?Quiet! I want radio discipline. Mike's hanging in. Larry, Jorgy? Listen up.Find out who lives at four-five-five. We gotta know who's in there.Did he say if she was shooting at him?Then we don't know if she's part of this or not. Mickey, you up?Mike found a red pickup abandoned on Flanders. You see it?Run a DMV on the plate for the owner's name.Jesus Christ, Louise, we can't leave a crime scene like that. Put a unit out there.That's not enough.Get everyone out here. Then call the Sheriffs. Tell them we have a possible hostage situation.That would be the girl who opened the door. Are the others inside?Louise?Get a phone number for the Smiths.Go, Mickey.Contact the landlord. I want to know employment, friends, family, anything we can find out about this guy.News hawks. There'll be more. They monitor our frequencies.Everyone be cool. That's our job right now--stabilize the situation and don't let things get out of hand. All we have to do is hang on until the Sheriffs take over. That's all we have to do.That's my job, Metzger. That's why I get the big bucks.My name is Jeff Talley. Is this Dennis Rooney?The Bristo Police Department. Look out the window. You see the car?We had an awful lot of shooting. You need a doctor in there?Let me speak to Mr. Smith. I want to hear it from him.How about your two friends? You don't have a man dying in there, do you?All three subjects are confirmed inside. Call off the house-to-house. Okay, Dennis, I want to explain your situation --Mr. Kim didn't make it, Dennis. He died.Dennis? I want you to release those people.We're not coming in there by force, okay? No one wants to hurt you.Has Dennis done time?Who's this?Have still prints made from the tape. Show the landlord. Maybe we can get a fast ID.Here on his head. Is that a tattoo?Says...burn it.He's watching Kim die.Just around the corner and up that street. See the helicopters?I should've called. This thing broke right after we spoke, then everything happened so fast --The Sheriffs will take over when they get here.Why don't you guys grab some dinner at the Thai place? I'll meet you there as soon as I can.I don't know how long I'll be stuck here.Jane?I'm scared shitless.I have the only number that can call into the house?Way to go.Mr. Dill, these pricks didn't know what they were going to do until they did it. I want you to take a look at something.Can you identify this man?Have Louise run the name 'Mars Krupchek' through DMV and NCIC. Tell her to list the tattoo as an identifier.Is Krupchek an aggressive guy? Hot- tempered? Anything like that?You have his address?Call the Palmdale City Attorney for a telephonic search warrant. When you get the warrant, have Mikkelson and Dreyer search his house.Louise?Call Jane for me. She's at the little Thai place.Tell her I'm almost home.I'm Talley. Who's in charge?I've got fourteen officers on my department including me. We're as secure as we can be.Don't crowd the house. The alpha's a kid named Rooney. He's amped up and volatile.I've done it once or twice. I blocked their phones to incoming calls, so you'll have to cut in a hard line to talk to him.Whatever you want.Who's that shooting? Martin, what's going on?They're too close! I told you not to crowd him! Pull back your people; do not breach that house!This thing good?Then get your men off the wall! You breach that house, we're gonna have a bloodbath! I know this guy, Captain -- I can talk to him.Look out the window, Dennis. We are NOT entering the house. We're pulling back.It's over now, Dennis! Don't hurt anyone.No one's coming in. A couple of guys out here got carried away.It's over. He's cooling off.I'm here.That's not going to happen, Dennis. They won't give you a helicopter.The Mexican police would arrest you as soon as it landed. There's only one way out and you're doing it right now--just keep talking to us. I think we could make the transition now. Maddox, you good to go?Hey, Dennis? Can I let you in on a personal secret?I gotta piss real bad.I'm going to put on an officer named Will Maddox. You talk to him for a while.He says he has gasoline set to burn the place.If you go in, you can't use tear gas or flashbangs. The whole place would go up.That's why you get the big bucks, Captain.Go.You have her cell number?They might be at the house. Keep trying and let me know. I'm going to be here a little while longer.Did you find Jane and Mandy?What's wrong with the radio?Stand by.Is something wrong with Jane?It's a crank, Louise. C'mon, don't waste my time with that!Put him on.Get Martin. Right away.This is Chief Talley. Tell me your name, son.Slow down, Thomas. Take it easy and talk to me. Was your father shot?How about you and your sister?Where are you right now?That's on the second floor. Could you climb out your window if we were downstairs to catch you?I've got the boy on the phone. He's using a cell phone. What was that, son? I didn't hear you.Thomas? Thomas...?He says that his father's hurt.They have security cameras. Rooney would see you coming.No. He said that his father's unconscious; he didn't say he was dying.You want me to stick around, I could --Jane? If you're there, pick up, okay? Mandy?Take it easy.I'm the Chief. I don't carry it.Who are you?What do you want?What is this?You can let go.Marlon and Al....I can't control what happens. The Sheriffs are running the scene.You want . . . Marlon and Al.These disks . . . where are they?I'm going back to York. Have Larry meet me at the front gate.I want you to run this license plate and phone number. Then I want you to find out everything you can about Walter Smith.Go back to the office. Run his name through the FBI and the NLETS database. I think he's involved with illegal activity or he associates with people who are.Don't tell anyone what you're doing, not Louise, not the other guys, not the Sheriffs. You understand me, Larry?Fuck guessing. You keep your mouth shut.Get to work.I'm re-assuming command of the scene.And now I'm taking it back. We're getting Smith out of the house.I changed my mind. That's all you need to know.The one and only. We got a little problem out here, Dennis.I need you to let me talk to Mr. Smith.We can't forget it. The Sheriffs think you won't let me talk to Smith because he's dead. They think you murdered him.If you don't let me talk to him, they're going to attack the house.Help me keep them out! Let me speak to Smith, Dennis. Let me speak to him right now.Talk to me, Dennis. Help me help you. Why can't you put Smith on the phone?Now I understand. That helps. I can make them understand that.Let me come get him.If you won't let me come in, then put him outside.You've already helped yourself once, Dennis; be smart again. If you save his life, it'll help when you get to court.Bring up the ambulance.Okay, Dennis, we won't approach the house until you've closed the door.Easy....Let's do it.How's he look?No.I'm the chief of police here. I have to talk to him.Smith! Wake up!Wake up, goddamnit. Who are you?Use smelling salts, give him a shot, whatever. I just need a minute.Stop the fuckin' engine!Just one question. Please.I want you waiting in Smith's lap. I want to know the second--and I mean the second--that he wakes up.Talley.What'd you find out?Dead end--it's a clone. What about the Mustang?You get anything on Smith?Keep trying.Call me. If you're safe, call me.Put him on.The doctors are taking care of him right now. Thomas . . . are you safe? Can you talk?I need your help with something. But if you think those guys could catch you, then I don't want you to do it, okay?I'm serious, Thomas; I don't want you to get hurt.Your dad has two computer disks. They have funny names: Marlon and Al.I think he was working on them today, so they're probably in his office. Could you find them and see who they belong to?I thought they locked you in your room.Can you get into the office?If I get Rooney into the back of the house, can you find the disks without being caught?I'm looking for you. I need your tactical unit.Don't question me, Captain! This is my crime scene!I'm a negotiator, Captain. I negotiate. That's all you need to know. Now are you going to help me or not?Okay, bud, here we go.Captain? Kill the lights.Come on, Dennis. Talk to me.I'm unarmed. I'm looking at you. Get out here and let's talk.Only if you try to grab me. We could've shot you from the wall.You've been in there a long time. What're you waiting for?I'd be trying to get the best deal that I could.You picked a bad house to hole up in, son.Give up.The man you sent to the hospital is a criminal. He has partners. This is their house and their money and they want it back.Give up, Dennis. Let these people go. At least you'll have your life.Can you open them?Look for names. Does it say whose taxes they are?Try Al. See if you can open Al.Who is it?Sonny Benza. Oh, fuck.Leigh? Metzger, answer me!Put a guard on Smith! I want you with Smith until I get there!Get in the car. Now.I'm posting a guard outside his room, but we'll need help from hospital security.Not with my officers here, no, ma'am.They're still in the house.I'm Jeff Talley, the Bristo chief of police. So far as we know, your children are okay.I need to talk to him. Alone.Sonny Benza has my wife and daughter. He wants the disks, Marlon and Al. He took my family to make me help.He's going to kill you. Don't you know that? He can't take the chance that you'll talk.Another minute. Please --Do you think I'm going to let you murder someone?!I'll go in that fuckin' house right now! I'll give those disks to the real FBI, you COCKSUCKINGMOTHERFUCKER!! And I've got Smith! I've got Smith!!I guess we do.Your phony FBI assholes.What do you mean by that?They here now?Yeah.Are all of you named Jones?You used to be a cop. All of you used to be cops. I can tell by the way you move.How do you people expect this to work? The Sheriffs have a Crisis Response Team here.What?Special Agent Jones.What are you people going to do?What does he have on you? I know why I'm doing this, but what does he have on you?Let it go, Captain.It's mine. Talley.Go, Mickey.Mickey? Call the state Homicide Bureau. Don't touch anything, just sit back and wait.We're getting those kids out of there.We've got to get those kids out of there!Those kids are in there with a fucking psychopath! He kills people!Talley.You do what you have to do; I'm getting those kids.The kids are in here!Help me, goddamnit, we can get the disks later!Thomas! Thomas, it's me!Stay close. We're going to move fast --Are the disks still in your room?Smith.Yes.A man has my family. Gold watch here. Dark tan.How do I reach him?Two words: Glen Howell.Mr. Jones is dead. So are two of his men. The other three are in jail. I have the disks. I have Walter Smith. And you know what, you motherfucker? I have you.I also have a couple of million in cash. Call Sonny Benza. Ask if I can keep it.My wife and my daughter and the money. I'll bring the disks to the mall by the freeway, you bring my family. We'll trade.I think you got no choice.Yeah.Police!Where's my family?! Where's my family, you fuck?!You said they would be here, goddamnit! Where are they?You said they would be here!Jane?You get the other one when I have my girls. Not talk to them; have them.Close.First my girls. I get my girls, you get the other disk.I'll kill you! You won't get the other disk!I love you.I gave the other one to the Sheriffs and they're giving it to the real FBI. This one's a fake.I'm a cop, you asshole! What did you expect me to do? Pretend all this never happened?Benza's over. You're over. I just want to take my family home.Why...?

KEVIN.raw_line: C'mon, Dennis, this is stupid. I thought we were gonna go to the movies.Robbing this place is gonna put you back in prison.We got jobs, man; we're working. Why even take the chance?Dennis! Dennis, someone's coming!There's fuckin' blood all over you!That woman's gonna call the cops.What if he's dead? What if you killed him?We're on foot. We can't get away.Dennis! The cops!We could've gone out the back! You didn't have to shoot!We should give up. All we're doing is making it worse.Mars? What are you doing?I have to tell you something --It's about Mars --That cop didn't pull his gun. Mars lied. He just started shooting!I was there, Dennis! I saw! It's like he wanted to shoot that cop.Jesus. What is this?I can see you!Dennis --Everyone knows what we look like, Dennis. We won't be able to hide.Stop it! Stop it, Dennis! Jesus!Here. Put this on.You gotta pee?Either I'm going to tie you or Mars will tie you. Which do you want?Whatever.He's just knocked out. I've been knocked out.I can't make Dennis see anything.Make sure she can breathe.Someone should stay with Mr. Smith. What if he wakes up?That's crazy, Dennis. The cops will see us.Like what?We can't carry all this. It's too heavy.Everything we're doing is making it worse. You can't let him burn this house.We're surrounded. They're all over the neighborhood.We're fucked.There is no way out.Celebrate what? Going to prison?What's he doing? What's going on?!He said that?What are you talking about?That's crazy. He's not going to kill us.It's over. We have to give up.That money's fucked up your brain. Talley's going to get tired of waiting for us to give up, and we'll all be fuckin' killed!I'm not going to die for this!Keep your voice down. I'm taking you and your brother out of here.Do you want to go or not? I'm offering you a way out of here.All three of us will go, but we have to move fast. Mars and Dennis don't know I'm doing this.Dennis and Mars are in the den. I'll get your brother, then come back for you. We'll go down the stairs and out the front door, you understand?Put on some shoes.You scared the shit out of me. I was looking for you. Dennis wants you to watch the monitors.It's over, Mars. If we stay the cops will kill us. Don't you get that?

DENNIS.raw_line: Mars?! Whattaya think, dude? Out here on the edge, no one around, it's perfect, right?Try to act cool, okay? He's gonna think you're a dick.Not if they don't catch us, Kevin.Because if you don't take the chance, you're already dead.Thirty seconds, we'll be down the road. Thirty seconds. Then we'll go to the movies.A pack of Marlboros for my friend and all your cash, you gook motherfucker!Mars, help me --I didn't know he would have a gun! It just went off!Jesus! Fuckin' Jesus, it's on my face!FUCK you, Mars! I got it all over me!MotherFUCKING piece of SHIT!!!Shut up, goddamnit! Just calm down!That's why we gotta keep going. I'm not gonna go in for murder.We're surrounded by houses, dumbass. Every house has a car in the garage. All we have to do is take one.I'm not going to hurt you.Stop fighting. Relax, and I'll let go.That's better. Be cool and we'll be outta here in five minutes. Understand?Who else is here?Get your ass in the chair! Sit down!She'll be dead if you don't put your ass in that chair!Kevin! Don't stand there, asshole, close the windows! Mars, keep him covered, dude!Don't go Rambo and you'll tell'm about this on the back nine. I'm gonna tie you up, then we're gonna take your car.Am I talkin' raghead?! I want your car! Gimme the goddamned keys!Open it! You remember I'm right here!Stop it! They found the truck, Kev! They're already behind us!Shut up! Shut the fuck up!Stay down! Stay down, goddamnit!You're not goin' anywhere! Get on the fuckin' floor!Get on the floor!I'll fuckin' kill you!We just killed a cop! We killed a fat chinaman! We'll get the death penalty!Mars, watch the cops! Kevin! Watch the back of the house!Bullshit!Shut up! Shut up and get on the floor!Shut up and sit down. You think someone's gonna make a house call?Make sure Kevin isn't fucking off back there.Hello?You with the cops?Yeah. I'm Rooney.We're cool.Fuck you. I'm running this shit. You talk to me.They're fine.You don't have to explain shit! That Chinaman pulled a gun. We wrestled for it. That Chinaman shot himself.How about the cop?Fuck that. They're the only thing stopping you from blowing us away.I got these people! You try to come get me, I'll kill every fuckin' one of them!That fuckin' Chinaman is dead! That's murder-one, dude. That's the needle!Get back where you belong, asshole! Mars, keep and eye on the cops; I gotta find a way out of here --We gotta find a way outta here is what we gotta do!Bullshit. Why would Mars do that?You're being stupid. Check out the bathroom. Maybe we can sneak out a window --Kev.Are you totally stupid? What does it look like?Look, that's the master bedroom out here.Dude, this is solid steel. They gotta be hiding something.Go get Mars.There's gotta be a million bucks here. Maybe two million!Who gives a shit, Mars? Check out the cash! We're rich.We can take it with us.Then we'll stuff it up our asses. This is the payoff. This is every dream you ever had, all in those two bags.Check me out! I look like fuckin' Jon Bon Jovi.Jesus, first Mars, now you. You two need anti-depressants.Hey, I've got a situation here, in case you haven't noticed.Use more ice.That's right. That's a good idea, Mars.Find something, Kevin. Don't just stand there. And tie this bastard, too. I don't want him waking up and goin' Rambo on us.That's why we tied him, dumbass. Now come here and see this --These bushes follow the wall into the neighbor's yard. All we need is some kind of diversion and we're home free.Not if they're looking at something else.I've been carrying you our whole fuckin' lives.Nothing's worse than listening to you. I'm warning you, Kevin--stop holding me back. Now you pick up that fuckin' money and get ready to go.They're coming! Kev, Mars, they're coming!!!The cops are comin'!We don't have time!Get the kids! They're our only chance!You fuck! I got a fuckin' gun to this kid's head! I'll kill'm, you fuck!We'll burn this fuckin' place down! I got gasoline all over in here!Goddamned right they got carried away. It looks like an army out there.Talley?I want a helicopter to take us to Mexico.I'll give you these people.What?You're a funny guy, Talley.What the fuck is that?Aw, Jesus, not more of this.Take'm back upstairs, but don't tie'm like before. That little fuck untied himself anyway.That you, Talley?You oughta try on the problem I got in here.We been through that. Forget it.That's bullshit! The guy's right here! He's alive!They better not!SHIT!!!!He got knocked out. It's like he's sleeping. He just lays there.Okay.Fuck that! You bastards will jump me!You'll cap my ass as soon as I step out the door!Fuck you, Talley, fuck you! You and one other guy, but that's it! I want you stripped! I gotta know you don't have guns!I'll be safe when I'm outta here, you asshole! I'm not talking any more!Keep the change, m'man.We're fucked until we think of a way out; then we're rich.For chrissake, please! Help me celebrate! I figured it out!No, dumbass--Talley. Talley's the guy who keeps us in here, and Talley's the guy who can let us out.Cops want to be rich like everyone else. All we have to do is share. And if he wants someone to swing for the Chinaman, we'll give'm Mars.Shit! It's the cops!Mars! They're trying to blindside us! Check the front!You got a sniper out there, gonna shoot me?Would you be in a hurry to go to prison for the rest of your life?Maybe that's what I'm doing. Can I reach in my pocket, show you something?That's fifty hundred-dollar bills. Five grand. They got money in this house, Talley, more than you've ever seen.How much would it be worth to you, getting me out of here?Two hundred thousand cash, right in your pocket, no one needs to know.There's a million dollars in there, maybe two million. I'll give you half.It ain't been a good day, Chief.I shouldn't have told him about the money. Now Talley is gonna keep it for himself.If we don't escape, we gotta get the word out about the cash. That's how we'll stay alive.The only way he can keep the cash is if nobody knows about it. He's gotta cap all three of us before they even read our rights. He's probably planning it right now.Kevin, you're so fuckin' stupid...Fuck it's over. That money's mine.Then we might as well die rich.You're my fuckin' anchor, Kevin, the fuckin' lead around my life that I've been draggin' like a cripple leg!Get this into your stupid head, Kevin. We're not leaving without the money.You got something to say?Fuckin' A.Kev? Key, Kevin, c'mon back. I'm sorry I hit you.C'mon, Kev, don't fuckin' pout! You're right. It's time to call it a game.You mean he left, as in went out the front door?Shit! That fuck! Even when I want to turn myself in he screws it up! Did he take the kids with him?Jesus, get upstairs and find out! If he took those kids, we're fucked!KEVIN!!! You ASSHOLE!!!Who's that? Goddamnit, who's there?Kev? Is that you? Talley?Kevin, if that's you, say something. Mars said you left.Kevin, what the fuck? Get up.MARS?!?!MARS!!!You're dead, you fuck.This fuck killed Kevin. There's blood everywhere down there --

JENNIFER.raw_line: Can't we send him to Florida?Tell Daddy that lunch is ready. Thomas, don't be a turd. Tell --!My father.I didn't . . . see anyone.Get out of our house!Why don't they go?! Why don't they leave us alone and go?!Daddy, don't!Leave him alone!!He's not waking up. He should be awake.He needs a doctor.At least let me get some ice for his head.I'm getting a wash cloth for the ice.Please get away from me.I don't drink beer.What I want is to help my father.My father needs a doctor. Please.All you're doing is watching yourself on TV. Look at him.I'm getting a doctor!I don't see why you can't just lock me in. It's not like I can go anywhere.Thanks for the shirt.Kevin, my father needs a doctor.If my father dies they'll charge you with his murder. Can't you make Dennis see that?Ow! Shit!No one's coming.Mine, too.No! I'm not going to leave Daddy with them!You go, Thomas. You get out, and I'll stay with Daddy.Go! If you get out, maybe you can help the police!You leave that gun alone!Better than you getting killed! Don't touch that gun! Daddy says --What about my father?Look at him! I think he's dying!Thomas?Thomas, is that you?What do you want?What?How about dog shit?I need a frying pan. Would you get one? Over there, under the range.What do you want?What happened?I can't go without Thomas.How can we get out?Yes.I don't know what you're talking about.Don't do that. Turn on the lights.You'd better get out of here! Kevin's coming back!Stop it.Please...Keep going!Run!!!!!No! They have everything nailed!He can't reach us in here. We're safe.What's he doing?Ohmigod, he's going to burn us!
